summary.para: TheSP_REGISTER_CONTROL_STATUS structure contains information about a file being registered or unregistered using the RegisterDllsINF directive to self-register DLLs on Windows 2000.

When sends aSPFILENOTIFY_STARTREGISTRATION orSPFILENOTIFY_ENDREGISTRATION notification to the callback routine, the caller must provide a pointer to a SP_REGISTER_CONTROL_STATUS structure in the MsgHandler parameter.

member.name: SP_REGISTER_CONTROL_STATUS.FileName
member.summary: Fully qualified path of the file being registered or unregistered.

member.name: SP_REGISTER_CONTROL_STATUS.Win32Error
member.summary: For an SPFILENOTIFY_STARTREGISTRATION notification, this member is not used and should be set to NO_ERROR. For a SPFILENOTIFY_ENDREGISTRATION notification, set to a system error code.

summary.para: For a SPFILENOTIFY_STARTREGISTRATION notification, this member is not used and should be set to SPREG_SUCCESS. For a SPFILENOTIFY_ENDREGISTRATION notification, set to one of the following failure codes that indicate the result of registration.

listheader.description: The file was successfully registered or unregistered. WinError not used.
LoadLibrary failed for the file. WinError contains an extended error code from the component.
GetProcAddress failed for the file. WinError contains an extended error code from the component.
DLLRegisterServer entry point returned failure. WinError contains an extended error code from the component.
DLLInstall entry point returned failure. WinError contains an extended error code from the component.
The file registration or unregistration exceeded the specified timeout. WinError is set to ERROR_TIMEOUT.
File registration or unregistration failed for an unknown reason. WinError indicates an extended error code from the component.

member.name: SP_REGISTER_CONTROL_STATUS.cbsize
member.summary: Size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: SP_REGISTER_CONTROL_STATUS.cbsize
member.summary: Size of the structure, in bytes.
